title: may 8: one wild subway ride (with Su Lee)
description:
Today on 365 days with mxmtoon, Maia talks about the time 16-year-old Keron Thomas disguised himself as a New York City subway motorman and operated a train full of commuters for three hours. Afterwards, she’ll chat with guest Su Lee. Join this episode today and make sure you’re following along with the daily updates @365daysmxmtoon on all platforms.
Learn more about your ad choices. Visit megaphone.fm/adchoices
